document.full_text: barry bonds once joked about avoiding getting caught when his trainer injected him in the navel, the baseball home run king's former personal shopper testified on thursday in the slugger's trial on charges he lied about doping.
document.title: personal aide says bonds joked about not getting caught
lines_and_colors: barry bonds once joked about avoiding getting caught when his trainer injected him in the navel, the baseball home run king's former personal shopper testified on thursday in the slugger's trial on charges he lied about doping.
